Articles.Content:
Before you ban this thread and say I broke the rules I will say. Make this a sticky so newbies wont make threads like this. When it's sticky they will click this and read and find out that it will come out

WHEN IT'S READY!!!!!!!

Moderators you can change this whole thread but make it a sticky for the sake of the useless threads people make.

First of all, it's generally accepted that more than half the newbs will not read any stickied threads. It's a sad, but generally accepted truth. The stickies are there so that some will read them and we have somewhere official to point the ones who don't.

Second of all, I'm 99% sure this is in the Rules thread somewhere anyway... Not completely certain, but the Rules post definitely says something about it.

Oh, and... if you want to tell people something, please for the love of God make it properly readable. Many of the users here will not necessarily be of English-speaking background. As such, you're doing them all (and those of us who cringe at the poor English) a favour if you take the extra time (however long it takes, patience is key) to be 100% certain of the grammar and sentence structure. It's better than most, but if you ever have a look in any of the stickied threads, they speak in much more clear, concise and fluent English. It makes it easier for those of us who can to read it, and it also makes the machine translations have a better chance of not producing jumbled garbage, if the person feels the need to translate the topic using something like Google Translate.
Indeed, it is in the rules so we do not need a sticky for this. Locking the thread.
